short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Faster & Focused Reading.Brain reads fasater than eye,so just a few letters enough to recognize whole word.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bionic Reader is a new way to read text in browser with ease.
This extension automatically converts webpages to the bionic reading format.

How to use:
Search the extension Menu and click Bionic Reader (Brain Icon)
It will popup the brain, Click it to enable/disable the extension.
